title: "Cobra" calve cover type
content:
Can anyone ID this font? Or something similar?  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010183510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cobra_3494.jpg)
author: vwcruisn

comments.content:
Probably custom. It's almost Eurostile or Microgramma with a different R.n Also try Trade Gothic Extended.

- Lex
It's pretty close to Bank Gothic with a modified C and R. The R looks Trade Gothic Extended like, but it's not.
